articles.author: Daily
articles.title: Shell boss warns of grim winter ahead as Russia cuts off gas supplies - This is Money
articles.description: Ben van Beurden (pictured) predicted a 'tough winter' as the war in  Ukraine prompted a scramble by EU nations to store up natural gas.
articles.content:
The boss of Shell has warned that energy may need to be rationed in the UK and Europe this winter as Russia chokes off gas supplies.
